pageContext.claim: “Do you remember like a year ago, year and a half ago I said, 'I'd like to take him to the back of the barn.' A slight slap, you don't have to close, even close your fist....remember that he actually like, 'I want to take him to the back of the barn.' They didn't say anything, if I said that they'd say this is a terrible human being right?”
pageContext.analysis: When Biden was asked in 2016, if he wished that he was able to debate Trump he responded, “No, I wish we were in high school. I could take him behind the gym. That's what I wish.” His remarks were widely reported and Trump responded to them at the time.
